charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was taking a walk
around town, when Ingo approached [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] to chat.
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_0200:
If it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]! What a
coincidence to see you here.
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_0300:
How are you doing? Have you decided on your
destination for today?
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_0401_0500:
Oh, is that so? In that case, would you care to
spend some time with me?
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_0402_0700: I see! In that case, why don’t you join us?
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_0800:
Of course, there is only one thing on my mind—a
Pokémon battle with you!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_0900:
Excadrill and I will be your opponents, and we’ll
give it our all!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_1000: Bravo! Once again, we had a terrific battle!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_1100:
Battling on Pasio is just as exciting as in the Battle
Subway—but in different ways!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_1200:
You know, I was riding the subway with Emmet,
and before we knew it, we were in a place we’d
never seen before...
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_1300:
It was a strange experience, but it was nothing
compared to my excitement about being in a place
that might have lots of strong Trainers!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_1400:
Our destination may have changed, but we’ve
found new goals to reach here on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_1500:
Excadrill and I have toppled many strong
challengers, and we’ve decided to get stronger
here on Pasio as a sync pair!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_0401_1700:
I’m honored you think so! Excadrill looks proud of
himself, too!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_0402_1900:
Why, thank you for those kind words! Excadrill
looks proud of himself, too!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_2000: I’m a Subway Boss from Unova...
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_2100:
My job is to transport promising talent like you
who board the Battle Subway to greater heights!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_2200:
However, here on Pasio, I myself am a passenger
on the road to improvement!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_2300:
Just as Excadrill pierces through steel plates, I
must also break through the mold of my past self!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_2400:
You are just as excited to do that as I am,
aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_0401_2600:
I knew it! Just as I thought, you caught my eye
for a reason!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_0402_2800: I could tell from that twinkle in your eyes!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_2900:
The path you take as you climb to greater heights
is much like a journey by train. Everything you see
along the way is new and exciting!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_3000:
From that battle we just had, I have a better idea
of where you’re headed for your final destination!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_3100: Who knows what awaits you during your journey?
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_3200: I look forward to seeing it play out!
charaepi_ch0108_00_nobori/2301_1201_3300:
All you have to do is keep moving forward, one
step at a time! Eventually, you’ll be running at full
speed to even greater heights!
